评论详情: Delivered on time fits awesome. Thanks you

This jacket is almost exactly like the photo, given that this style is going to fit different bodies differently. There are pockets galore and I felt like it was true to size, I actually would have downsized a little if I hadn't needed the jacket sooner. Overall, I recommend this for street wear, cosplay, concerts, whatever!

I have to admit I was skeptical at first, and was just hoping I could get something resembling what I got in the photos. But then it came and I was totally shocked! The quality is actually incredible, everything is in place and held together well, no pockets or straps coming loose. The feel of the material is great and the lining is really nice and light. It looks just like the pictures and fit true to size. I haven't worn in in the rain but in a brief check in the sink it seems to be waterproof too. Overall absolutely great and worth the price. I love it!!
Short, short, short. I'm 6'2 190lbs, thinking smaller sizes would probably be short, went up to 2xl, why would you only make it wider but not longer when you size up?
Great fit, good material, very comfortable and it looks good.

Sad to say that as soon as I put it on and tried to zip it up the zipper broke. Thankfully some superglue was able to repair it for now, will have to see how long it lasts. Otherwise love everything about the coat, lots of pockets and warm

评论概述: True-ish to Size. Don't believe those that say it runs big.
评论详情: Quality came as expected given the origin, albeit maybe a bit pricey for it. Has some pockets that are just decorative flaps and not actual pockets. Came out of the shipping bag with an odd smell. Will need to "air it out" before wear. It feels thin but appears as if it will serve as a decent windbreaker / light-rain jacket if needed.  The biggest factor is the fit:  Despite what others have said, this jacket is "True to Size" and does not wear "longer" or "more spacious" as others have stated. I went with both the measurement recommendation as well as Amazon's size recommendation, and it's not nearly as long or spacious as I had anticipated based on prior reviews.  I would recommend buying One Size Larger than suggested if you are looking for the fit as shown in the model images.  Overall appearance is as expected save for the above mentioned notes.

It's simply a good jacket. I love this style of jacket and when I got it, it happened to be the last one. I don't regret my purchase at all and I will update this review in maybe a year or so going over wear and tear but I don't wear these as often as I'd like but since it's becoming Autumn I'll be able to wear it as much as I'd like soon!
the windbreaker is super high quality but very over sized but is completly water proof
Great fabric. Washes nicely we hang dry
Das passt perfekt, sieht gut aus und Versand war schnell.
Diese Jacke ist ein echter Volltreffer. Das Preis Leistungsverhältnis ist top. Sie ist bequem und sieht einfach nur klasse aus.  Sehr gute Verarbeitung.
Esteticamente bella, niente da dire, ma il prezzo non vale la qualità della giacca a mio avviso, consiglio di comprarla in sconto nel caso.

The jacket looks good and fits well (and feels good on the skin if you're wearing short sleeves). Ordered it in XL so it is spacious, however I would've liked there to be a bit more length in the body.  Also, when you read the product description it reads: "The outer shell of this XYXIONGMAO streetwear jacket is made of 100% cotton material..." — The label inside the jacket on the other hand reads "100% polyester" for both the 'face cloth' and 'lining'. I dunno why there are two different descriptions for the same item (and what the actual material of the jacket is SUPPOSED to be), but whoever's in charge of these details needs to sort this out; can't be giving viewers/buyers the wrong info.
